quote: Knowledge will give you power, but character respect.
name: Bruce Lee

quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life.
name: Richard Bach

quote: When you practice gratefulness, there is a sense of respect toward others.
name: Dalai Lama

quote: If we lose love and self respect for each other, this is how we finally die.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: Most good relationships are built on mutual trust and respect.
name: Mona Sutphen

quote: A child who is allowed to be disrespectful to his parents will not have true respect for anyone.
name: Billy Graham

quote: One of the most sincere forms of respect is actually listening to what another has to say.
name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: We don't need to share the same opinions as others, but we need to be respectful.
name: Taylor Swift

quote: I'm not concerned with your liking or disliking me... All I ask is that you respect me as a human being.
name: Jackie Robinson

quote: Just imagine how different the world could be if we all spoke to everyone with respect and kindness.
name: Holly Branson

quote: Honest communication is built on truth and integrity and upon respect of the one for the other.
name: Benjamin E. Mays

quote: Respect for ourselves guides our morals, respect for others guides our manners.
name: Laurence Sterne

quote: Life is short, and we should respect every moment of it.
name: Orhan Pamuk

quote: If we desire respect for the law, we must first make the law respectable.
name: Louis D. Brandeis

quote: Do we not realize that self respect comes with self reliance?
name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: There is no respect for others without humility in one's self.
name: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: I love making new friends and I respect people for a lot of different reasons.
name: Taylor Swift

quote: Treat everyone with respect and kindness. Period. No exceptions.
name: Kiana Tom

quote: A great chef is an artist that I truly respect.
name: Robert Stack

quote: Be loyal to those who are loyal to you. And respect everyone, even your enemies and competition.
name: John Cena

quote: Civilization is a method of living, an attitude of equal respect for all men.
name: Jane Addams

quote: Without feelings of respect, what is there to distinguish men from beasts?
name: Confucius

quote: Different people have different opinions, and it's okay to respect all of them.
name: Juan Pablo Galavis

quote: If we are not free, no one will respect us.
name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: In Republics, the great danger is, that the majority may not sufficiently respect the rights of the minority.
name: James Madison

quote: Show respect to all people, but grovel to none.
name: Tecumseh

quote: When you have that respect from your teammates, it makes it a lot more comfortable.
name: LeBron James

quote: Everyone should be respected as an individual, but no one idolized.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: A person's a person, no matter how small.
name: Dr. Seuss

quote: I respect everybody, but at the same time, I carry myself with an aura that demands respect, too.
name: Lil' Kim

quote: I believe in one power, and that is the hand of God. I respect all religions.
name: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: The only thing I command is respect.
name: Kyrie Irving

quote: We need to respect the oceans and take care of them as if our lives depended on it. Because they do.
name: Sylvia Earle

quote: Being brilliant is no great feat if you respect nothing.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: You have to respect your audience. Without them, you're essentially standing alone, singing to yourself.
name: K. D. Lang

quote: When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everybody will respect you.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: Live with integrity, respect the rights of other people, and follow your own bliss.
name: Nathaniel Branden

quote: I have respect for beer.
name: Russell Crowe

quote: Everyone in society should be a role model, not only for their own self-respect, but for respect from others.
name: Barry Bonds

quote: Respect your partner. Be happy in your partner's happiness.
name: Divyanka Tripathi

quote: The crown must constantly earn citizens' appreciation, respect and trust.
name: Felipe VI of Spain

quote: To be one, to be united is a great thing. But to respect the right to be different is maybe even greater.
name: Bono

quote: Nothing is more despicable than respect based on fear.
name: Albert Camus

quote: How do leaders serve their people? They may pay good wages and treat employees with respect.
name: John C. Maxwell

quote: Respect the burden.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Love is about mutual respect, apart from attraction.
name: George Best

quote: If you have ten thousand regulations you destroy all respect for the law.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: I think I'm a natural-born leader. I know how to bow down to authority if it's authority that I respect.
name: Tupac Shakur

quote: I come from a poor family, I have seen poverty. The poor need respect, and it begins with cleanliness.
name: Narendra Modi

quote: I always remember having a healthy respect for my grandmother.
name: Prince William

quote: Here's my gift-giving rule: Respect your current financial situation.
name: Suze Orman

quote: Respect is one of the greatest expressions of love.
name: Don Miguel Ruiz

quote: If man doesn't learn to treat the oceans and the rain forest with respect, man will become extinct.
name: Peter Benchley

quote: We all require and want respect, man or woman, black or white. It's our basic human right.
name: Aretha Franklin

quote: Love, friendship and respect do not unite people as much as a common hatred for something.
name: Anton Chekhov

quote: When men and women are able to respect and accept their differences then love has a chance to blossom.
name: John Gray

quote: Do dirt, get dirt. So I treat people with the same respect that I want.
name: DMX

quote: To the living we owe respect, but to the dead we owe only the truth.
name: Voltaire

quote: To get down to the quick of it, respect motivates me - not success.
name: Hugh Jackman

quote: Women absolutely deserve respect.
name: Aretha Franklin

quote: I have always believed that I should have had no difficulty in causing my rights to be respected.
name: Eli Whitney

quote: Self-respect is the fruit of discipline; the sense of dignity grows with the ability to say no to oneself.
name: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quote: Let every man be respected as an individual and no man idolized.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: I respect myself and insist upon it from everybody. And because I do it, I then respect everybody, too.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: Economics is a subject that does not greatly respect one's wishes.
name: Nikita Khrushchev

quote: Men have a respect for scholarship and learning greatly out of proportion to the use they commonly serve.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I don't think about, 'Oh, I'm finally getting my respect,' because I don't care about this.
name: Khabib Nurmagomedov

quote: Since I've started fighting it has taught me a lot about self respect, self confidence and self control.
name: Gina Carano

quote: I grew up with just my mum and sister, so I respect women a lot.
name: Harry Styles

quote: In all our deeds, the proper value and respect for time determines success or failure.
name: Malcolm X

quote: Respect yourself if you would have others respect you.
name: Baltasar Gracian

quote: I want to be very close to someone I respect and admire and have somebody who feels the same way about me.
name: Richard Bach

quote: Your peers will respect you for your integrity and character, not your possessions.
name: David Robinson

quote: When we respect everybody around us, we are in peace with everybody around us.
name: Don Miguel Ruiz

quote: We must respect the past, and mistrust the present, if we wish to provide for the safety of the future.
name: Joseph Joubert

quote: If someone lacked decency or respect, I didn't allow that person to stay in my world.
name: Gabrielle Union

quote: Let them hate me, provided they respect my conduct.
name: Tiberius

quote: America wants its respect.
name: Tupac Shakur

quote: We're all human, and part of being human is showing respect and support for others' life choices.
name: Daniel Lubetzky

quote: The final test of a gentleman is his respect for those who can be of no possible service to him.
name: William Lyon Phelps

quote: Aging has a wonderful beauty and we should have respect for that.
name: Eartha Kitt

quote: I never make the mistake of arguing with people for whose opinions I have no respect.
name: Edward Gibbon

quote: If you don't stand for something, how can anyone respect what you do?
name: Miranda Lambert

quote: The way forward is always found through greater respect for the equal rights of all.
name: Martin O'Malley

quote: Ask an older person you respect to tell you his or her greatest regret.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: When a woman removes her garment, she also removes the respect that is hers.
name: Herodotus

quote: I respect my father as a father, but I also respect him as an honorable chairman.
name: Akio Toyoda

quote: I hate victims who respect their executioners.
name: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: I respect Chris Brown. I'd like to call myself a friend - I don't know if I'm allowed to do that.
name: Drake

quote: Respect for the truth comes close to being the basis for all morality.
name: Frank Herbert

quote: One of the surprising things in this world is the respect a worthless man has for himself.
name: E. W. Howe

quote: You can't respect yourself if you're afraid to be who you are.
name: Amber Heard

quote: It's important for couples to be friends first and to respect each other as individuals.
name: Anupam Kher

quote: I guess at the end of the day, all women like to be appreciated and treated with respect and kindness.
name: Sofia Vergara

quote: Fabric is the most extraordinary thing; it has life. You must respect the fabric.
name: Hubert de Givenchy

quote: If I respect myself and believe in what I'm doing, no one can touch me.
name: Fiona Apple

quote: I fear God and respect God and love God.
name: Brett Ratner

quote: Men who love their mothers treat women wonderfully. And they have enormous respect for women.
name: Ellen Barkin

quote: A man's real life is that accorded to him in the thoughts of other men by reason of respect or natural love.
name: Joseph Conrad

quote: I have great respect for the semicolon; it is a mighty handy little fellow.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: If once you forfeit the confidence of your fellow-citizens, you can never regain their respect and esteem.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: When people do not respect us we are sharply offended; yet in his private heart no man much respects himself.
name: Mark Twain

quote: We do not covet anything from any nation except their respect.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: The bad gains respect through imitation, the good loses it especially in art.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Don't worry about what the people say; be yourself, say what you want to say with respect.
name: Mariano Rivera

quote: Go up close to your friend, but do not go over to him! We should also respect the enemy in our friend.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: It is not desirable to cultivate a respect for the law, so much as for the right.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: A brainy person does not abuse copyright; instead they respect it and uphold it.
name: Maximillian Degenerez

quote: I have great respect for the Pope. I like the Pope. I actually like him.
name: Donald Trump

quote: To retain respect for sausages and laws, one must not watch them in the making.
name: Otto von Bismarck

quote: I respect Apple. It's a great company that changed the world, especially the mobile time.
name: Jack Ma

quote: The people respect and believe in men who fulfill their duty.
name: Fidel Castro

quote: With all due respect, the Mona Lisa is overrated.
name: Paulo Coelho

quote: 'Harry Potter' gave me back self respect. Harry gave me a job to do that I loved more than anything else.
name: J. K. Rowling

quote: Grace, respect, reserve, and empathetic listening are qualities sorely missing from the public discourse now.
name: Meryl Streep

quote: I get no respect. The way my luck is running, if I was a politician I would be honest.
name: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: I don't wait for people to give me respect. I always give them respect.
name: Mariano Rivera

quote: Once you figure out what respect tastes like, it tastes better than attention. But you have to get there.
name: Pink

quote: That's what people respect, the fact that I wasn't a chump that laid on his back and gave up.
name: Mike Tyson

quote: I have nothing but respect for the Lakers. So many of their legends shaped who I am as a person and player.
name: Bill Walton

quote: In writing, I apply my feminine side and respect the mystery involved in creation.
name: Paulo Coelho

quote: Our high respect for a well read person is praise enough for literature.
name: T. S. Eliot

quote: Men are so willing to respect anything that bores them.
name: Marilyn Monroe

quote: This is how you start to get respect: by offering something that you have.
name: Morrie Schwartz

quote: Your private life is your private life and you keep it to yourself. You get more respect that way.
name: Jay Kay

quote: I have a respect for manners as such, they are a way of dealing with people you don't agree with or like.
name: Margaret Mead

quote: I deserve respect for the things I did not do.
name: Dan Quayle

quote: I don't want or need to gain respect with what I do off the court. I want respect for what I do on the court.
name: Vince Carter

quote: Gymnastics taught me everything - life lessons, responsibility and discipline and respect.
name: Shawn Johnson

quote: I try to be kind to people, to treat them with respect. And I'm proud of that.
name: Lee Ryan

quote: Respect is one of life's greatest treasures. I mean, what does it all add up to if you don't have that?
name: Marilyn Monroe

quote: I've got no respect for any young man who won't join the colors.
name: Nathan Bedford Forrest

quote: All I ever seek from good deeds is a measure of respect.
name: Walter Annenberg

quote: People have to respect intellectual property.
name: Coco Lee

quote: Where the people possess no authority, their rights obtain no respect.
name: George Bancroft

quote: Men naturally despise those who court them, but respect those who do not give way to them.
name: Thucydides

quote: The sea speaks a language polite people never repeat. It is a colossal scavenger slang and has no respect.
name: Carl Sandburg

quote: I see the entire world as Eden, and every time you take an inch of it away, you must do so with respect.
name: Joni Mitchell

quote: Respect for the fragility and importance of an individual life is still the mark of an educated man.
name: Norman Cousins

quote: Strong women, that's who I really respect.
name: Victoria Beckham

quote: You have to discipline your children, or they won't respect you, law enforcement or God or anyone else.
name: Phil Robertson

quote: By respect for life we become religious in a way that is elementary, profound and alive.
name: Albert Schweitzer

quote: How can a Man respect his Wife when he has a contemptible Opinion of her and her Sex?
name: Mary Astell

quote: I think as long as you wear your imperfections on your sleeve, people respect it more.
name: Shamir

quote: If you are sincere and true to your work, you will be respected. And for me, respect is power.
name: Riteish Deshmukh

quote: I certainly respect other people's opinions, but I would not vote for a woman to be the pastor of a church.
name: Charles Stanley

quote: I respect Lady Gaga very much.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: Respect the masterpiece. It is true reverence to man. There is no quality so great, none so much needed now.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: I don't have to participate in another culture's ceremonies in order to respect that culture.
name: Sherman Alexie

quote: Respect for right conduct is felt by every body.
name: Jane Austen

quote: I don't envy or much respect people who are completely politicised.
name: Christopher Hitchens

quote: Respect is what we owe; love, what we give.
name: Philip James Bailey

quote: I always show great respect for everyone, including Manchester United.
name: Antonio Conte

quote: Respect for the rights of others means peace.
name: Benito Juarez

quote: I respect the Congress's oversight responsibility.
name: Hillary Clinton

quote: We should all consider each other as human beings, and we should respect each other.
name: Malala Yousafzai

quote: New York gave me hell for that 'Purple Swag,' man. They didn't respect me until 'Peso.'
name: ASAP Rocky

quote: If your partner wants to be private, you have to respect that.
name: Billie Jean King

quote: Treating your adversary with respect is striking soft in battle.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: I'm a good girl because I really believe in love, integrity, and respect.
name: Katy Perry

quote: If your religion doesn't respect the rights of other religions, it is lacking something.
name: Roger Ebert

quote: The new republic should be based on diversity, respect and equal rights for all.
name: Evo Morales

quote: I respect the rules of TV, the rules of keeping things commercial and interesting and pop-y and fun.
name: Joss Whedon

quote: We must respect the referee every time.
name: Claudio Ranieri

quote: By deafness one gains in one respect more than one loses; one misses more nonsense than sense.
name: Horace Walpole

quote: Just as kids need to learn to respect their elders, we are a society that increasingly respects our youth.
name: Faith Salie

quote: When someone you have a lot of respect for believes in you, it helps you believe in yourself.
name: Cat Osterman

quote: I have a wonderful respect for old people.
name: Craig Kilborn

quote: I think it is important that we respect that women have different political views.
name: Cathy McMorris Rodgers

quote: I want to be a good actor more than anything - someone you can respect.
name: Logan Lerman

quote: I believe in the rule of law, and I respect the will of Colorado voters.
name: George Brauchler

quote: I respect anyone who has to fight and howl for his decency.
name: Deborah Kerr

quote: I will not speak with disrespect of the Republican Party. I always speak with respect of the past.
name: Woodrow Wilson

quote: I believe that God wants us to show respect.
name: Victoria Osteen

quote: I have such respect for 'Democracy Now!'
name: Alice Walker

quote: I'm sick of just liking people. I wish to God I could meet somebody I could respect.
name: J. D. Salinger

quote: When about to commit a base deed, respect thyself, though there is no witness.
name: Ausonius

quote: I think the short story is a very underrated art form. We know that novels deserve respect.
name: Neil Gaiman

quote: I respect Drake not only as a creative person but as a business mind as well. I think Drake's important.
name: Frank Ocean

quote: I always have tried to treat people with respect, the way I want to be treated.
name: Derek Jeter

quote: I grew up to always respect authority and respect those in charge.
name: Charles de Gaulle

quote: At sea a fellow comes out. Salt water is like wine, in that respect.
name: Herman Melville

quote: I turned down twelve films last year... Huge money films, but I had no respect for the writer or the work.
name: Shia LaBeouf

quote: The challenge is to get everyone to respect music again, to recognize its value.
name: Jay-Z

quote: I just feel like if I do good work, then people should respect me for the work I do.

quote: What Iran wants and what North Korea wants is respect.
name: Andrew Young

quote: Our moral, religious, and political traditions are united in their respect for the dignity of human life.
name: Robert Casey

quote: If we have no respect for our viewers, then how can we have any respect for ourselves and what we do?
name: Christiane Amanpour

quote: The worst evil of disregard for some law is that it destroys respect for all law.
name: Herbert Hoover

quote: Peace can be contributed to by respect for our ability in defense.
name: Herbert Hoover

quote: The great rule of moral conduct is next to God, respect time.
name: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quote: I just work with people that I love and respect, that inspire me to be a better person, a better artist.
name: J Balvin

quote: People respect nonfiction but they read novels.
name: E. O. Wilson

quote: You earn the respect of your peers that you play against, and they don't trash talk you.
name: LaDainian Tomlinson

quote: In our culture we have such respect for musical instruments, they are like part of God.
name: Ravi Shankar

quote: Treat the audience with respect and maturity, and have a certain faith in them to catch up.
name: Duncan Jones

quote: There is no excuse for perjury - never, never, never. There is truth, and the truth demands respect.
name: Ken Starr

quote: I really respect certain brands, mixing and matching and having your own look regardless. Having a bold look.
name: Kevin McHale

quote: I'm not a big fan of Women's Liberation, but maybe it will help women stand up for the respect they're due.
name: Loretta Lynn

quote: I've got tremendous respect for different cultures, for the food and everything.
name: Ian Rush

quote: Children need teachers who have stars in their eyes themselves and who treat them with respect.
name: May-Britt Moser

quote: Humility is a great quality of leadership which derives respect and not just fear or hatred.
name: Yousef Munayyer

quote: You demand respect and you'll get it. First of all, you give respect.
name: Mary J. Blige

quote: Most young people have tremendous respect for older people's views.
name: Dennis Prager

quote: Honoring the priesthood fosters respect, respect promotes reverence, and reverence invites revelation.
name: Russell M. Nelson

quote: I respect women to the utmost.
name: Magic Johnson

quote: Respect for self is the beginning of cultivating virtue in men and women.
name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: I respect artists so much, and I absolutely love music as the ultimate art.
name: Christie Brinkley

quote: I'm getting my respect as a video director. The fashion industry respects me and knows who I am.
name: ASAP Rocky

quote: I adore adverbs; they are the only qualifications I really much respect.
name: Henry James

quote: If you respect a language and culture, it shows in your work.
name: A. R. Rahman

quote: I do object to those who jump from political hackery to flackery and expect respect.
name: Molly Ivins

quote: I respect and admire what cops do.
name: Charles Barkley

quote: I respect faith, but doubt is what gives you an education.
name: Wilson Mizner

quote: I am not an anti-Semite! I have a great respect for the Jewish people.
name: David Icke

quote: Golf is game of respect and sportsmanship; we have to respect its traditions and its rules.
name: Jack Nicklaus

quote: Americans have been conditioned to respect newness, whatever it costs them.
name: John Updike

quote: Because we should always respect other nationalities, I have always tried to play them with dignity.
name: Ricardo Montalban

quote: I think that a society lives or dies according to its respect for - for its art.
name: Kris Kristofferson

quote: Respect isn't enough. You've got to have a proprietary interest.
name: Chuck Berry

quote: I respect only those who resist me, but I cannot tolerate them.
name: Charles de Gaulle

quote: We believe in equal respect for all faiths.
name: Atal Bihari Vajpayee

quote: Respect all manner of men regardless of their station in life. Compassion is one of the greatest virtues.
name: Anthony Carmona

quote: The highest ideals are human intelligence, creativity and love. Respect these above all.
name: Penn Jillette

quote: I'm just trying to do my job and my part to make this a team that people respect.
name: Blake Griffin

quote: I'm just here to say, 'Just be a good person, and really respect others.'
name: Logic

quote: Only a coward will use a gun to protect and get respect for themselves.
name: Emmanuel Jal

quote: It's difficult to love someone you don't respect, which is hard to remember when you're having an argument.

quote: You either respect people's liberties, or you don't.
name: Mauricio Macri

quote: A student never forgets an encouraging private word, when it is given with sincere respect and admiration.
name: William Lyon Phelps

quote: This is the final test of a gentleman: his respect for those who can be of no possible service to him.
name: William Lyon Phelps

quote: I would love to work with Mario Testino. I respect all the work he has done and is doing.
name: Nyle DiMarco

quote: But really, we also need to learn how to love one another as women. How to appreciate and respect each other.
name: Chaka Khan

quote: If political leaders want respect, they will begin by enforcing the global rule of law.
name: Sharan Burrow

quote: I dislike math, yet I respect and appreciate the fact that math is the language of the universe.
name: Lucas Grabeel

quote: I don't want to be bored; I don't want to be with someone I don't respect.
name: Robyn Davidson

quote: I will take every match seriously and respect every opponent.
name: Lin Dan

quote: For a long time, we got no respect. People thought we just got lucky. They said we were a one-record wonder.
name: Pepa

quote: I think, when you value yourself and respect yourself, everything else just falls into place.
name: Tina Knowles

quote: People must respect our movement.
name: Cyril Ramaphosa

quote: If you don't respect me you're not gonna get that respect back.
name: David Hasselhoff

quote: I think people just don't respect women's bodies in general, the bodies of women of color in general.
name: Phoebe Robinson

quote: The only respect you should have is the one you earn.
name: Stellan Skarsgard

quote: I respect people's opinion. Everybody has they own 'pound for pound' list.
name: Bernard Hopkins

quote: I respect public employees and school teachers. They deserve a secure retirement.
name: Gina Raimondo

quote: I've got a lot of respect for tuba players, just carrying that thing around.

quote: While speaking in the NA, one must maintain respect.
name: Asma Jahangir

quote: There's no glory and no respect in making fun of the weak, the powerless.
name: Bassem Youssef

quote: I'm a kid who has a lot of respect. I believe in respect.
name: Tito Ortiz

quote: I think people respect honesty rather than hiding it.
name: Jack Whitehall

quote: I respect women that have a voice and use it for a proper reason.
name: Betty Wright

quote: It is so important to get respect for what you do and at the same time give it.
name: Estelle Parsons

quote: Respect is not ever assigned; it's earned.
name: Linda Tripp

quote: I'm proud of myself, people love me and respect me, and I like me. I like who I am.
name: Ellen Greene

quote: A police force, wherever they are, is made up of amazing people, and I respect them a great deal.
name: Nancy McKeon

quote: You have to love your body, respect it, and treat it well.
name: Irina Shayk

quote: Atlanta embraced us. We have so much respect for them, and they have respect for us.
name: Quavo

quote: If every man loves his mother, he's going to treat the ladies right, with love and respect.
name: Mr. T

quote: I respect anybody that cooks. I know how hard it is.
name: Guy Fieri

quote: I will have to earn trust and respect from my kids.
name: Tiger Woods

quote: Mutual respect! That's what it takes to be friends.
name: Hugo Chavez

quote: I firmly believe that respect is a lot more important, and a lot greater, than popularity.
name: Julius Erving

quote: Teachers make a difference in individual students' lives, yet they do not get the respect they deserve.

quote: As the mother of two daughters, I have great respect for women. And I don't ever want to lose that.
name: Vera Wang

quote: I believe no matter who you are, respect yourself, respect others.
name: Mo Farah

quote: We were a family who had come from nothing and now we had respect from French people of all sorts.
name: Zinedine Zidane

quote: I always respect a woman.
name: Enrique Iglesias

quote: I have nothing against respecting people who lived before, but we have no responsibility toward them.
name: Leon Kass

quote: In fact I am quite snappy and irritable, and I don't know if I'd like to make myself worse in that respect.
name: Nigella Lawson

quote: As far as military necessity will permit, religiously respect the constitutional rights of all.
name: George B. McClellan

quote: We owe our law enforcement officers the highest respect.
name: John Fleming

quote: Be modest, be respectful of others, try to understand.
name: Lakhdar Brahimi

quote: People want to hear what I have to say and respect what I say.
name: Jennifer Capriati

quote: A human society obeys the dictates of reason and is guided and governed by a respect for justice.
name: Ferdinand Buisson
